result.title: Idea concept of the European Framework Model for responsible ICT innovation
result.description: Idea concept of The European Framework Model based on the initial concept presented in the proposal Detailed development of the concept and structure based on the literature review desktop analyses field research and inputs from the first Advisory Board workshop The idea concept will be the bases for development of the Model composing of jointly developed and used definitions guidelines and tools for enforcing RRI and SSH issues in ICT research and innovation

result.title: RIF ENMI
result.description: The RIF ENMI Annual Research and Innovation Week T34 will be filmed and stored in IRIs online archive of digital studies research where it will also be made available to ERs ERSs ad the broader public for contributive research annotation in line with IRIs commitment to developing prototypical innovations in web publishing tools M136 For the last several years a selection of articles from the annual Entretiens du Nouveau Monde Industriel have been published in IRIs series with FYP with roughly an 18 month delay M21 M2414 M2421
